svg.text: Eth News and Links
Pectra upgrade size discussion (potentially cap scope)
All core devs
â€¢ All core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) #191 : Pectra (Prague + Electra)
upgrade: pectra-devnet-1 : now expect to launch in 1-2 weeks, locally
tested with 2 execution layer + 3 consensus layer clients EIP7702 :
delegation designation proposal to be merged & included in
pectra-devnet-2 RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile : discussion on including
in Pectra, whether to use RIP precompile address & what return value to
use; review inclusion at next ACDE EIP7002 EL triggered withdrawals &
EIP7251 maxEB : agreed to add events Pectra size discussion :
potentially capping (strong support) or reducing (some support) scope
Discussions: history expiry and improving blob transaction propagation
To progress non-upgrade specific features need to target specific
devnets, provide updates at all core devs & more breakouts
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: pectra-devnet-1 : now expect to
launch in 1-2 weeks, locally tested with 2 execution layer + 3 consensus
layer clients EIP7702 : delegation designation proposal to be merged &
included in pectra-devnet-2 RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile : discussion on
including in Pectra, whether to use RIP precompile address & what return
value to use; review inclusion at next ACDE EIP7002 EL triggered
withdrawals & EIP7251 maxEB : agreed to add events Pectra size
discussion : potentially capping (strong support) or reducing (some
support) scope
â€¢ Discussions: history expiry and improving blob transaction propagation
To progress non-upgrade specific features need to target specific
devnets, provide updates at all core devs & more breakouts
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade:
â€¢ pectra-devnet-1 : now expect to launch in 1-2 weeks, locally tested
with 2 execution layer + 3 consensus layer clients
â€¢ EIP7702 : delegation designation proposal to be merged & included in
pectra-devnet-2
â€¢ RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile : discussion on including in Pectra,
whether to use RIP precompile address & what return value to use; review
inclusion at next ACDE
â€¢ EIP7002 EL triggered withdrawals & EIP7251 maxEB : agreed to add
events
â€¢ Pectra size discussion : potentially capping (strong support) or
reducing (some support) scope
Discussions: history expiry and improving blob transaction propagation
â€¢ To progress non-upgrade specific features need to target specific
devnets, provide updates at all core devs & more breakouts
Osaka + F starname upgrade
â€¢ Verkle implementers call #20 : blockhash handling to use EIP4788
behavior, sync during transition needs to be combination of snap & full
sync and avoiding extra EOF extcodesize/hash costs
